argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | srgbinom.s | |- S = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | srgbinom.m | |- .X. = ( .r ` R ) |
| 3 |  | srgbinom.t | |- .x. = ( .g ` R ) |
| 4 |  | srgbinom.a | |- .+ = ( +g ` R ) |
| 5 |  | srgbinom.g | |- G = ( mulGrp ` R ) |
| 6 |  | srgbinom.e | |- .^ = ( .g ` G ) |
| 7 |  | #P_3simpb | |- ( ( R e. SRing /\ G e. CMnd /\ N e. NN0 ) -> ( R e. SRing /\ N e. NN0 ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ( R e. SRing /\ G e. CMnd /\ N e. NN0 ) /\ ( A e. S /\ B e. S ) ) -> ( R e. SRing /\ N e. NN0 ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_simprl | |- ( ( ( R e. SRing /\ G e. CMnd /\ N e. NN0 ) /\ ( A e. S /\ B e. S ) ) -> A e. S ) |
| 10 |  | #P_simprr | |- ( ( ( R e. SRing /\ G e. CMnd /\ N e. NN0 ) /\ ( A e. S /\ B e. S ) ) -> B e. S ) |
| 11 |  | #P_simpl2 | |- ( ( ( R e. SRing /\ G e. CMnd /\ N e. NN0 ) /\ ( A e. S /\ B e. S ) ) -> G e. CMnd ) |
| 12 | 5, 1 | #P_mgpbas | |- S = ( Base ` G ) |
| 13 | 5, 2 | #P_mgpplusg | |- .X. = ( +g ` G ) |
| 14 | 12, 13 | #P_cmncom | |- ( ( G e. CMnd /\ A e. S /\ B e. S ) -> ( A .X. B ) = ( B .X. A ) ) |
| 15 | 11, 9, 10, 14 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( ( R e. SRing /\ G e. CMnd /\ N e. NN0 ) /\ ( A e. S /\ B e. S ) ) -> ( A .X. B ) = ( B .X. A ) ) |
| 16 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 | #P_srgbinom | |- ( ( ( R e. SRing /\ N e. NN0 ) /\ ( A e. S /\ B e. S /\ ( A .X. B ) = ( B .X. A ) ) ) -> ( N .^ ( A .+ B ) ) = ( R gsum ( k e. ( 0 ... N ) |-> ( ( N _C k ) .x. ( ( ( N - k ) .^ A ) .X. ( k .^ B ) ) ) ) ) ) |
| 17 | 8, 9, 10, 15, 16 | #P_syl13anc | |- ( ( ( R e. SRing /\ G e. CMnd /\ N e. NN0 ) /\ ( A e. S /\ B e. S ) ) -> ( N .^ ( A .+ B ) ) = ( R gsum ( k e. ( 0 ... N ) |-> ( ( N _C k ) .x. ( ( ( N - k ) .^ A ) .X. ( k .^ B ) ) ) ) ) ) |
